etymologies: mid 19th century: modern Latin, from Greek mus ‘muscle’+ asthenia

definitions: a condition causing abnormal weakness of certain muscles.
shortDefinitions: condition causing abnormal weakness of certain muscles

definitions: a rare chronic autoimmune disease marked by muscular weakness without atrophy, and caused by a defect in the action of acetylcholine at neuromuscular junctions.
shortDefinitions: rare chronic autoimmune disease marked by muscular weakness without atrophy, and caused by defect in action of acetylcholine at neuromuscular junctions
